summary: A paraplegic computer engineer in a wheelchair starts hearing noises and voices of bank robbers in his basement.
cast: Leonardo Sbaraglia|Pablo Echarri|Clara Lago|Federico Luppi|Uma Salduende|Walter Donado|Laura Faienza|Facundo Nahuel Giménez|Javier Godino|Ariel Nuñez Di Croce|Cristóbal Pinto|Sergio Ferreiro|Daniel Morales Comini|Juan Carlos Nozzi|Sergio López Santana|Néstor Castro|Guillermo Jacubowicz|Luciano Conti|Noemí Contreras|Luz Giménez|David Rodriguez|Aníbal Pérez|Ariadna A. Pérez Coronel
title: Al final del túnel
